title: FINAL FANTASY XII THE ZODIAC AGE
notes: Configuration utility won't run from Steam - launch FFXII_TZA_GameSetting.exe via Wine in a terminal in the game's installation directory to configure video settings.

title: FINAL FANTASY XII THE ZODIAC AGE
notes: Configuration tool does not load,  Game play is fine, however the game will occassionaly not start when selection Play Final Fantasy XII The Zodiac age.  Restart the game and it will load.  No Xbox one controller support.

title: FINAL FANTASY XII THE ZODIAC AGE
notes: Configuration Tool doesn't load, but isn't needed as all the options from the Tool (and more) are accessible from in-game.
More than 50 hours. Very good performance and also working with xbox one controllers bluetooth and usb
title: FINAL FANTASY XII THE ZODIAC AGE

notes: Runs perfectly however if you disable vsync globally you'll need to toggle vsync on in game to cap fps to 60 to prevent hyper-speed.
title: FINAL FANTASY XII THE ZODIAC AGE
